name: Space Shooter (itch) (Grimrot)
description:
The 1st ever game I have created without following along with tutorials and using their assets. Without further ado, I introduce to you, Space Shooter!

An arcade inspired 2d side-scrolling shoot-em-up set in outer space where you commandeer a spacecraft capable of firing projectiles at oncoming asteroids and enemy vessels. 

Duck, dodge and destroy to the best of your abilities and see what kind of high score you can achieve!

(All Assets found in Unity Asset Store)

Sounds Effects - GWriterStudio

Music - B.G.M

Art - Ansimuz

Project Management - Damien Mojzak

Game Design - Damien Mojzak

Programming - Damien Mojzak

Special thanks to Erk, Gaia and Remz for testing!
